name: ma27/api-key-authentication-bundle
description: A bundle that provides the possibility to generate api keys for rest apis

suggest.doctrine/orm: When storing the users in an SQL database
suggest.doctrine/mongodb-odm: When storing users in a mongodb database
suggest.doctrine/couchdb-odm: When storing users in a couchdb database
suggest.hautelook/phpass: When using the PHPass hashing strategy
